description:
Key Features:
Interact with Your Digital Credit Report: Easily access and understand your Credit Report. Get clear visibility into your credit status, including details on your credit cards, loans, payment history, and more.
 
Monitor Your Credit Score: View your 3-digit Credit Score that predicts your payment likelihood. Understand what influences your score and how lenders perceive your creditworthiness.
 
Boost Your Credit Score: Learn how your payment behaviour impacts your score and get great tips on how to improve your score and overall creditworthiness.
 
Get confidence by using the Cheque Clearance Indicator: now you can check the chances of a cheque to clear based on the issuer's payment track record and credit history in the UAE.
 
Easy Data Correction: Found an error in your report? Simply select the information you wish to correct within the app, provide the required details and documentation, and submit your data correction request directly to the information provider with the click of a button. You can conveniently track the status of your request right here in the app.

Download the Etihad Bureau app today – your essential tool for understanding and managing your credit standing in the UAE!

SHOP NOW. PAY LATER
Tabby lets you shop what you love and split purchases into four monthly payments — with no interest, no hidden fees and no surprises. Whether you're shopping online or in store, Tabby gives you control, financial flexibility and peace of mind.

SHOP FROM TOP BRANDS
Discover and shop your favorite brands including AMAZON, SHEIN, IKEA, ADIDAS, SIVVI, CENTREPOINT, and many more in one shopping app. The Tabby app is your one-stop shopping destination, packed with fashion, electronics, home goods, makeup, and more.

COMPARE PRICES & SAVE MONEY
Track price drops and compare products across multiple stores. With smart alerts, you’ll always get the best deal — your personal price-checker, built right in.

NEW DEALS AND DISCOUNTS EVERY DAY
Shop daily discounts, coupons and promotions from top brands. Never miss a deal — just open the app and see what’s new.

FIND NEARBY STORES THAT ACCEPT TABBY
Use our in-store map to discover shops and malls that accept Tabby. Try before you buy and still pay later. Search by brand, category or location.

ONE APP FOR ALL YOUR SHOPPING
Manage payments, track purchases, get reminders and explore new brands — all in one app.

PROTECT YOUR PURCHASE WITH TABBY CARE
Tabby Care adds extra peace of mind. It covers your purchases, makes returns easy and protects your order every step of the way.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use chat in the Tabby app for round-the-clock support.

Tabby gives you the freedom to pay later with no interest, no fees and no surprises — so you can shop on your terms.

Follow us to stay up-to-date on new stores and latest deals:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tabbypay/

X: https://x.com/paywithtabby/

Need help? Reach out to http://help.tabby.ai/

Fast, transparent personal loans for UAE residents 
 
CashNow lets you secure an instant loan straight from your phone. Our simple 5-step application process can be completed in under five minutes and you can receive funds in their bank account within minutes after approval. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

What makes CashNow stand out? 

Real speed – apply, get a decision, and get approved - on the same day. 

Fixed, easy pricing – AED 150 processing fee plus a flat 6 % interest for the full three-month term. No hidden extra charges. 

Licensed & regulated – CashNow (Quantix Technologies) is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE 

Paper-free – just your Emirates ID and basic details; no credit documents or bank documents 

Full control – track disbursement, repayment dates, and loan balance inside the app. 

Data security – Your personal information is safe with us.  

Options for everyone: We have variety of lending options from small loans starting from AED 100 to upto AED 30,000. Your repayment history and your credit behaviour can unlock various limits for you.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Simple cost example 
 

You choose to borrow AED 1,500 at a 3 month tenure:  
→ we deposit AED 1,350 in your account after deducting the AED 150 fee 
→ repay AED 530 each month for three months (total AED 1,590) 

Your repayment amount is fixed on day one—no surprises later. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Eligibility 

→ UAE residents aged 20 – 55 
→ Valid Emirates ID 
→ Regular monthly income 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

How to get your quick loan 

→ Download & install CashNow (it’s free). 
→ Sign up and KYC with Emirates ID  
→ Choose how much you need.  
→ Submit—fill out some basic details and submit. You get a near instant decision on your application 

Receive the money in your bank account if approved, usually within minutes. 
 

That’s it—no branch visits, no paperwork. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ 

Is CashNow safe? 
Yes. We are a licensed and regulated entity by Central Bank of UAE and comply with all UAE lending regulations. 

Can I repay early? 
Absolutely. Early settlement is allowed at any time with a small fee.  

What if I’m declined? 
Our risk algorithm updates frequently so make sure to keep applying every few days!! 
Your application status will not reflect your credit score. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Download CashNow today and solve your cash needs—fast, fair, and fully transparent. 

*T&C Apply

Introducing e& money - Your Ultimate Financial Super App!

 

Experience the power of e& money, a fully-owned e& brand and the first digital wallet licensed by the Central Bank of UAE. As the fintech arm of e& life, e& money is set to revolutionize your financial journey with our cutting-edge financial super app marketplace. Look no further, for you've found the best finance application.

 

Our mission is to empower UAE citizens and residents with seamless payment solutions that are quick and hassle-free. With just your Emirates ID and mobile number, you gain access to a wide array of financial services within a single application. From a rewarding prepaid card, international and local money transfers to merchant payments, bill settlements, gifting, and beyond, e& money has you covered!

 

Join us today with a simple registration process:

 

1. Enter your mobile number

2. Upload your Emirates ID

3. Take a selfie

4. Provide your email ID

5. Set your PIN - and you're all set!

 

Discover the boundless possibilities with e& money:

 

1. e& money account:

   - Experience a fee-free wallet with no charges

   - Instantly obtain your e& money card

   - No minimum balance requirement

 

2. Rewarding e& money card:

   -  Get your digital and physical e& money card

  -   Earn 1% cash rewards on every card transaction

   - Seamlessly add to Apple Pay, Google and Samsung Wallet

 

3. Conveniently Add Money:

   - Load money instantly from the comfort of your home

 

4. International Money Transfers:

   - Securely transfer money to over 200 countries

   - Choose from various options like bank transfers, cash pick-up, and wallet transfer

 

5. Local Money Transfers:

   - Effortlessly send money to your friends with just their mobile number
   - Forget the hassle of withdrawing money every time you need to pay your domestic help. Just enter their mobile number and transfer is done instantly

   - Send money directly to bank account

 

6. Bill Payments and Top Ups:

   - Easily top up Salik, Nol cards, and more

 

7. Thoughtful Gifting:

At e& money, we're dedicated to covering all your payment needs and more. Your feedback and ideas matter to us; please feel free to reach us at 800-392-5538.

Ziina is a first-of-its-kind financial platform for individuals and businesses in the UAE who need a fast and secure way to send and receive money. Unlike traditional institutions, Ziina is a local partner that reimagines money to be simple, social, and stunning. For businesses, get paid instantly everywhere business takes you. You can accept payments instantly in person, on social media, and on your website. Make the money part easy for customers and easy for business so you never miss a beat—or a sale.

ZIINA PERSONAL
Ziina makes peer-to-peer payments a breeze. Whether you find yourself needing to split bills among friends, reimburse someone for a cab ride, or make everyday payments, Ziina ensures you can instantly transfer money, all while keeping your transactions secure and hassle-free. Effortlessly accept payments via QR codes and payment links, enabling you to receive funds from both credit cards and Apple Pay with ease. It's all managed within your Ziina wallet, providing you with the flexibility to either retain your funds or opt for a swift cash-out to your UAE bank account. Plus when you use your Ziina Wallet balance or a UAE debit card to send payments, there are zero fees on your first 5,000 AED in transactions.

ZIINA BUSINESS
Ziina Business is the one-stop shop for all your business needs. Get 5,000 AED in zero processing fees when you join. Plus, when you invite another business to the Ziina family, both of you can earn an extra 5,000 AED in free processing. Whether you're launching a startup or managing an established business, Ziina Business is here to help you with all the tools you need to keep your business running smoothly

SECURE PAYMENT GATEWAY
Ziina's payment gateway is tailored for businesses in the UAE. Whether you're just starting or an established business owner, Ziina's payment gateway makes it quick and easy to accept payments on your website within seconds. Our payment gateway integrates seamlessly with all major platforms, including Shopify, WooCommerce, WordPress, and custom websites. Plus, our multi-currency feature enables you to accept international payments in up to 10 different currencies.

PAYMENT LINKS
Ziina offers secure payment links on demand for all businesses and freelancers looking to accept Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, Apple Pay, or Google Pay. Use your payment links to easily accept international transfers, get paid by clients, and take your business cashless. 

PAYMENT KEYBOARD
No more switching between apps or converting PDFs to generate client bills or invoices. Ziina's payment keyboard simplifies payments within messaging apps. With ZiiBoard, you can easily send invoices, whether you're chatting on WhatsApp, Instagram, or other messaging apps.

CUSTOM QR STANDS AND NFC CARDS
For in-person and offline payments, Ziina offers branded QR code stands and NFC cards. Whether you're at markets, pop-ups, or mobile stalls, customers can conveniently scan and pay with Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cards. Your funds instantly appear in your Ziina wallet, eliminating waiting times.

FAST CASH-OUTS
When you receive money with Ziina, you can keep the money in your mobile wallet or cash out instantly to your bank account. (Ziina supports all UAE banks, including RAKBANK, ADCB, Emirates NBD, Citibank UAE, HSBC and more). We offer instant cash-outs to help you stay cash flow positive. We'll transfer the funds in your Ziina wallet to your bank account usually within a few hours and at most 1-2 working days.

INSTANT ANALYTICS
Keep a pulse on your sales with our analytics report. Use it to track revenue, get a better understanding of your finances. 

PRIVACY AND SECURITY
Ziina Payment LLC  is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE under license number 1112672. Your account features biometric authentication and employs PCI-DSS certified technology to safeguard payment card information.

Get paid the Ziina way today. Download the app and sign up in 1 minute to get started.

Let’s bring the bank to YOU! 
The FAB Mobile app puts the power of the bank in your hand. Spend, save and stay on top of your everyday banking from just about anywhere. 

DOWNLOAD. REGISTER. DONE!
If you’re a FAB customer or using the app on a new device, here’s how you can get started once you download the app:
•	Tap ‘Already a customer’ and enter your credit or debit card number or customer number
•	Tap and scan your Emirates ID
•	Do the face scan as prompted – to ensure that only you have access to your account
•	You’re done! Now you can start banking anywhere, anytime.   
 
NEW CUSTOMER? NO PROBLEM!
Start your journey with FAB right from your living room. Simply download the app and open an account, get a credit card or get approved for a personal loan – without stepping into a branch. You only need an Emirates ID. 
 
YOUR MONEY. YOUR WAY.
We know you value your time, so we’ve made sure you can do a whole lot of your banking, whenever you want. Here are some of things you can do:
•	View your balance and e-statements
•	Activate your card
•	Pay your utility bills
•	Get an Easy Payment Plan 
•	Sign up for Islamic accounts
•	Earn and redeem FAB Rewards
•	Start an iSave and enjoy a higher rate of interest
•	Upload your account documents – passport, visa, Emirates ID
•	Login with Fingerprint or Face ID
•	Locate your nearest FAB branch or ATM
•	Enjoy free and instant transfers to India, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and Philippines 
•	Enjoy exciting offers and exclusive discounts

Experience more power at your fingertips.

Experience the new and improved mobile banking app from ADCB. Enjoy seamless banking on-the-go with the enhanced features combined with an intuitive and user-friendly visual experience.

More power at your fingertips

- A simplified 'Payments and Transfers' section where you can view your beneficiaries and registered billers all in one screen
- Search Payees and Transaction History by name, amount and much more
- Dual language option in Arabic and English

Plus, you can continue to enjoy these services

- Balance Preview
- Bill Payment
- Funds Transfer
- Locate ADCB ATM and Branches

If you are a new ADCB Mobile App user or if you are using the app on a new device, register with the following steps:

- Download and launch the ADCB Mobile App
- When prompted, enter your ADCB Credit Card/Debit Card Number and PIN; enter the activation key that is sent to your registered mobile number
- Alternatively, you can enter your ADCB Customer ID and activation key which you can obtain through our Personal Internet Banking or the 24/7 Contact Centre

If you are an existing user, you will be prompted to enter your existing ADCB Mobile App password for authentication and biometric re-enrollment (handset dependent).

The ADIB Mobile Banking app gives you the freedom to manage your money on the go. View all your accounts at a glance, pay your bills, send money to your family & friends, pay your bills, recharge your phone & Salik credit, apply for financing and much more!

Features include: 
·  A timeline of all your account transactions
·  Transaction detail with a single tap
·  Enhanced security - Login with Touch ID or Face ID
·  Ability to temporarily block your card & request for card replacements
·  Get personal finance from the comfort of your home (if you qualify)
·  Option to personalize your app with images for accounts
·  One place for all your payments
·  Update Emirates ID, Passport, mobile number and email
·  View your personal, identification and contact details
·  Transfer money from your ADIB Visa or MasterCard to your account
·  Pay bills with your Visa / MasterCard
·  Open a new account
·  View exchange rates for your foreign currency accounts
·  Location of all ADIB Branches & ATMs
·  Register for phone banking, SMS banking and e-statements
·  Change your Phone Banking ePIN
·  View your Financing and Card transaction details
·  Search transactions by entering keywords
·  View pending transactions
·  Apply for an ADIB service (Certificates, Chequebooks, etc.)
·  Push notifications – Get offers that you like
·  Request new products / services directly within the app
·  View your ADIB Covered card benefits

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. You can send money directly from your debit card or bank account (depending on your location)

Why use TapTap Send to send money?

- Fast money transfers – most transfers arrive in minutes

- Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees when you send money

- Great exchange rates – we negotiate daily to offer you more value when you transfer funds

- Convenient transfers – send from your phone, anytime, anywhere

- Multiple payout options – transfer money to mobile wallets, bank accounts, or for cash pickup

You can send money to over 50 countries, including:

Pakistan

India

Nigeria

Ghana

Brazil

Mexico


…and many more. Explore the full list at taptapsend.com.

Send money from:

United Kingdom

United States

European Union

Canada

United Arab Emirates

Australia

We work with leading banks and financial partners to ensure your money reaches where it’s needed. Transfer money to:

Mobile wallets: Orange Money, MTN, JazzCash, Easypaisa, bKash

Bank accounts: HBL, UBL, Access Bank, Fidelity Bank, and many more

Cash pickup: Available at trusted partner bank branches in select countries

TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We understand the challenges of sending money internationally and are here to make every money transfer easier, faster, and more affordable. If you ever need support, our friendly team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Our Mission
We believe that diaspora communities deserve fast, secure, and fair ways to send money home. For too long, sending money internationally has been expensive and difficult. We’re changing that — by lowering costs, reducing delays, and improving your experience every time you transfer money.

Download TapTap Send and start sending money today.
Transfer money home — fast, safe, and stress-free.

*FX Gains apply
*Exchange rates for illustrative purposes only. Exchange rates are dynamic and are subject to fluctuation.

description:
Secure, convenient, and trusted banking with the DIB alt mobile banking app – your smart banking partner.
Welcome to alt mobile, your ultimate solution for seamless, secure, and Sharia-compliant banking. With over 135+ services at your fingertips, managing your finances has never been easier. Whether you are looking to control your bank accounts, pay bills, transfer funds, or explore banking solutions, the DIB alt mobile banking  app is designed to simplify your life.
Why Choose alt mobile?
Islamic Banking Excellence: Enjoy Sharia-compliant services tailored to your financial needs from one of the region’s leading banks.
All-in-One Convenience: Manage your bank accounts, covered cards, debit cards, savings accounts, and more in one intuitive bank application.
Unmatched Security: Advanced encryption, biometric login, and real-time fraud monitoring ensure your data and transactions are always protected.
Key Features
-	Comprehensive Account Management:
View all your accounts, deposits, financing, and covered or debit cards – in a single dashboard.
Track your balances, transactions, and future-dated payments with ease.
-	Instant Personal Finance & Covered Cards:
Existing customers with required eligibility can get personal Finance and Covered Cards instantly (eligibility Terms and Conditions apply)
-	Instant Account Opening for New Customers:
New customers can open an account within minutes via DIB alt mobile banking app. 
-	Aani Payments:
Support for Aani enrollment, enabling users to complete transactions via the Aani App
-	Instant Transfers & Payments:
Transfer money within DIB or to other banks in AED or foreign currencies.
Pay utility bills, covered card bills, and more – instantly from your bank app
-	Cardless ATM Withdrawals:
Customers can transfer money instantly using DIB Mobile App, enabling recipients to withdraw cash from any of our ATMs without a physical card
-	Currency Converter:
Check exchange rates and convert currencies.
-	Branch & ATM Locator:
Find the nearest DIB branch or ATM effortlessly.
-	Exclusive Offers & Promotions:
Access hand-picked deals and new banking products at your fingertips directly from your smart banking app.
-	Future-Dated Payments & Calendar:
Schedule recurring payments and transfers; manage them via a built-in calendar.
Open new Account in Minutes
Existing customers can create their online / Mobile credentials using their card 24/7 Access: Bank anytime, anywhere, with round-the-clock access to your accounts. Islamic Banking Excellence: Enjoy Sharia-compliant banking services tailored to your financial needs.

Download Now and Transform Your Banking Experience


Join thousands of satisfied users who rely on DIB’s trusted banking app to manage their daily finances. Whether it’s bill payments, money transfers, or checking your savings account, alt mobile is your ultimate financial companion.



We Value Your Feedback
Your satisfaction is our priority. Share your feedback with us to further enhance your mobile banking experience.



Dubai Islamic Bank (Public Joint Stock Company)
Al Maktoum Road,
Deira, Dubai, UAE

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Over 700,000 NRIs and Indian expats trust Aspora to send money to India at the live Google rate with no hidden fees. Aspora customers have already saved over ₹125 crore in hidden charges. For Indians in the UK & UAE, Aspora makes it simple to support family, pay bills, and manage savings back home.


◼ Live Google exchange rates

With Aspora, you always get the live rate you see on Google. Aspora never hides markups so you always get more for your money.

Aspora makes sending money to family, paying bills, or saving in India quick and reliable. Aspora is FCA-regulated in the UK and partners exclusively with RBI-regulated banks in India, and with Lulu Exchange in the UAE, to keep your money secure.

◼ Military-level Aspora security

Every transfer through Aspora is protected by military-grade 256-bit encryption and strict adherence to global financial regulations.


◼ 24/7 Aspora support

◼ Easy, intuitive Aspora app

Get started with Aspora in just 5 minutes. The Aspora app is designed to make sending money home feel as simple as sending a message.


◼ Send to 3,000+ Indian banks with Aspora


Aspora supports transfers to HDFC, ICICI, SBI, Axis Bank, Kotak Mahindra, IndusInd, Federal Bank, PNB, and thousands more.


Go ahead, compare Aspora’s rates with Remitly, Wise, Western Union, LemFi, WorldRemit, Skrill, ICICI Bank, Revolut, TapTapSend, HDFC, Xe, MoneyGram, and others. Aspora’s live Google rate, no hidden fees, and FCA regulation mean you’ll always get more for your money. 


Download Aspora today and join the growing community of NRIs, Indian expats, and Indians in the UK and UAE who rely on Aspora to send money home with confidence.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

developer: National Bank of Ras Al Khaimah
description:
Welcome to a whole new Digital Banking Experience! 
 
RAKBANK App offers convenience and security with a host of features & intuitive user experience.
 
Key features
 
·         Seamless Digital Account opening – Open your account on the app and get your virtual debit card in a few clicks. 
·         Biometric Login - Login using your Fingerprint or Face ID
·         Card Activation – Activate your Debit or Credit card without even logging into the app
·         Reset Card PIN – Reset your Debit or Credit Card PIN easily (applicable for eligible cards)
·         Multiple Bill Payments – Pay your bills in one go
·         Quick View – Easy access to commonly used banking services 
·         Quicker Funds Transfers - Send money instantly within UAE or use our RAKMoneyTransfer service to send money instantly abroad.
·         Mobile Cash – Self or beneficiary card less cash withdrawal using a RAKBANK ATM machine
·         Discover and Apply – Learn more and apply for RAKBANK products 
·         Live Chat – Chat for help or information from within the app
 
 
How to register:
 
Download the RAKBANK app, click Register and follow simple on screen instructions to enter a card or account number along with the PIN to register and start using the app.
 
Kindly note, this app will not work on jail broken devices.

Physical address:

RAKBANK Corporate Office Dubai
P.O. Box 5300,
Dubai Silicon Oasis
Dubai, UAE

Privacy Policy Link: https://www.rakbank.ae/en/privacy-policy

Welcome to du Pay
Send money quickly and easily with the app that speaks your language.
 
We understand that sending money should be simple, secure and convenient. That's why we've designed an app that not only enables sending money seamlessly to your loved ones but also speaks many languages. 
 
What can you do with du Pay?
- Send money back home at competitive rates and fees
- Send money in the UAE to any valid mobile number
- Pay your bills
- Recharge or top up your mobile number


How to get started?
- Download the du Pay app 
- Keep your Emirates ID handy and complete the simple verification steps.
- Add money into your wallet through your debit/prepaid card, inward bank transfer or via our network of payment machines.

We go the extra mile to protect you!
- We use 2-factor authentication, fraud prevention, and a secure backend infrastructure.	
- By tying your account to your mobile number, we ensure you’re always in control.	
- We’re partnered with established financial institutions to ensure your money is safe.
- We're regulated by the Central Bank of the UAE.

Want to send money online? Manage your Al Ansari Exchange Prepaid Cards? Pay your credit card and utility Bills?

Welcome to the latest technology; OUR SUPER-APP.

Our app is your all in one solution to manage your payments and money transfers,easily, securely and efficiently. We have multiple payment options such as online bank transfers, credit cards, Visa/ Mastercard debit cards, direct debit, PayPlus card or even cash at the branch to make your experience with us as convenient as possible. Our team is working round the clock to ensure the latest payment modes are available.

Join over 1 million users who downloaded our application and have honored us with an outstanding 4.5+ star rating. Rated as the top Fintech App in the UAE, GCC and the second in the Middle East Region, on the Forbes Middle East list of the Top 15 Fintech Apps 2021.

Download the app now and sign-up easily using the “UAE PASS” to start availing our services instantly.

Services include:

• Sending money across the globe at the best exchange rates anytime from
anywhere
• Pay using a wide range of free payment options
• Manage your Al Ansari Exchange prepaid cards
• Pay your credit card fees.
• Top-up your international mobile or that of your loved ones.
• Pay for your airline tickets, your utilities bills and your telecom expenses
• Settle your governmental services charges.
• Track your transactions
• Get alerts on preferred rates
• Control over your notifications
• Locate nearest branches and get directions

Al Ansari Exchange is regulated by the Central Bank of the UAE.

Get in touch with us straight from the app or by contacting our customer service on hello.app@alansari.ae or on 600546000.

Your banking and financing are about to power up your lifestyle while making it easier to save for the future. 



Key app features:

A UAE Bank Account:
Open a UAE bank account from your phone with Al Maryah Community Bank, licensed by the Central Bank of the United Arab Emirates.



Open in less than 5 minutes:
The fastest access to banking and benefits – Your account will be functional in less than FIVE minutes due to seamless account opening experience.

Gold for Free:
Take advantage of no minimum balance and no annual fee for Gold Accounts.



Remit or Receive Payments:
Send money or receive payments to your current account.



Get in Control: 
This is the one banking app that will give you control on spending limits and save.

PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card and debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and to make instant payments at your favourite offline and online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds and buy insurance plans on PhonePe. Get Car & Bike Insurance on our app.
Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment, investment, mutual funds, insurance and banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking.

Things you can do on PhonePe (Phonepay) App:

Money Transfer, UPI Payment, Bank Transfer
- Money Transfer with BHIM UPI
- Manage Multiple Bank Accounts – Check Account Balance, Save Beneficiaries across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.

Make Online Payments
- Make online payment on various shopping sites like Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra etc.
- Pay for online food orders from Zomato, Swiggy etc.
- Pay for online grocery orders from Bigbasket, Grofers etc.
- Pay online for travel booking from Makemytrip, Goibibo etc.

Make Offline Payments
- Scan and Pay via QR Code at local stores like kirana, food, medicines etc.

Buy or Renew Insurance Policies with PhonePe Insurance App

Health & Term Life Insurance
- Compare and buy Health & Term life Insurance with monthly premiums
- Coverage for individuals, senior citizens and families

Car & Two Wheeler Insurance
- Browse and get India’s most popular bike and car insurance
- Buy/renew your car and bike Insurance in less than 10 minutes

Other Insurance
- Personal Accident Insurance: Insure yourself against accidents & disablement
- Travel Insurance: Get international travel insurance for business and leisure trips
- Shop Insurance: Insure your shop against fire, theft, natural calamities, and burglaries.

Mutual Funds App and Investments App
- Liquid Funds: Get higher returns than savings bank 
- Tax-Saving Funds: save up to Rs. 46,800 in tax & grow your investment
- Super Funds: Achieve financial goals with expert help on our app 
- Equity Funds: High growth products curated as per risk appetite
- Debt Funds: Get stable returns for investments without any lock-in period
- Hybrid Funds: Get a balance of growth and stability 
- Buy or Sell 24K Pure Gold: Assured 24K purity, build gold savings on our app

Recharge Mobile, DTH
- Prepaid Mobile Recharge, DTH
- Recharge for Airtel, Jio, Vi, BSNL and MTNL prepaid mobile numbers
- Recharge DTH set-top boxes for TataPlay, Airtel Digital TV, Sun Direct, Dish TV and D2H providers.

Bill Payment
- Pay Credit Card Bills
- Pay Landline Bills
- Pay Electricity Bills
- Pay Water Bills
- Pay Gas Bills
- Pay Broadband Bills

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards
- Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline and online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds
- Manage and track refunds from your favorite shopping websites on PhonePe.
For more details, Visit our website at https://www.phonepe.com/

Permissions for App and reasons
SMS: to verify Phone number for registration
Location: a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts: for phone numbers to send money to and numbers to recharge
Camera: to scan QR code
Storage: to store scanned QR code
Accounts: to pre-populate email ID while signing up
Call: to detect single vs dual sim and let user choose
Microphone: to carry out KYC video verification

developer: AL ETIHAD PAYMENTS COMPANY - SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP L.L.C
description:
Aani: Your Gateway to Instant Payments in the UAE!

Welcome to Aani, the cutting-edge payments platform brought to you by Al Etihad Payments, a subsidiary of the Central Bank of the UAE. Aani is here to revolutionize the way you handle your payments, offering seamless and secure instant payment services for your convenience.

Why Choose Aani?
With Aani, you can transfer funds swiftly and effortlessly, anytime, anywhere, 24/7. Experience the freedom of managing transactions up to AED 50,000 instantly, putting you in control of your finances like never before.
Innovative Features for Your Ease:
-	Easy and convenient: Everyone in the UAE can now send money to friends and family using just a mobile number. 
-	QR-Code Based Payments: Scan and pay swiftly using QR codes for hassle-free transactions.
-	Request to Pay: Request payments from friends, family, or clients with just a tap.
-	Split Payments: Easily divide bills and expenses among friends or colleagues without the hassle.


Aani - Where Convenience Meets Security:
We understand the importance of security when it comes to your finances. Aani is designed with robust security measures, ensuring your transactions are safe and your data is protected at all times. Experience the ultimate blend of convenience and peace of mind with Aani.

Join the digital revolution today with Aani! Simplify your payments and enjoy the ease of instant transactions. 

Download the app now and embrace a future where your payments are just a tap away.

With the new and improved version of ADCB Hayyak, whether you are a salaried individual, non-salaried or a homemaker, you can start your banking relationship with ADCB in minutes.
 
You can even choose your preferred language & type of account, credit card & loans/finance - available even in Sharia compliant solutions.
 
What you can do on ADCB Hayyak:
• Start your banking relationship enriched with tailored premium benefits
• Instantly open a current or savings account
• Explore our range of rewarding credit cards for every lifestyle and get one which suits you.
• Check your eligibility for a Personal Loan/Finance and apply instantly
• Choose the Millionaire Destiny Savings account and enter into a draw to win AED 1 million every month

What’s more?

No queues, no waiting, no hassle – we deliver your welcome kit directly to your doorstep.
Download the app and follow the simple steps to get started.

Personal Loan Details:
• Interest rates (VAT not applicable) – 5.24% to 12% per annum
• Processing fees for Personal Loans is 1.05% of the loan amount
• Loan repayment tenures start at 6 months and are up to a maximum of 48 months
• For example, if your loan amount is AED 100,000 the interest rate is 7.25% for a payback period of 48 months then your monthly installment will be AED 2,407, and processing fees will be AED 1,050. The total loan repayment amount including processing fee will be AED 115,500.
• Terms and Conditions apply

Address: Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank Building,
Shk Zayed street.
P. O. Box: 939, Abu Dhabi
United Arab Emirates

Travel smart, spend smarter. No foreign exchange fees + 1% cashback on your international debit transactions.

Physical card? Order anytime.
Virtual cards, real control. Customize your design, set spending limits, and shop securely online or in-store.
Access 3,000+ stocks, ETFs, crypto and more-all in one secure platform.
Crypto, simplified. Buy & sell directly from your AED account-no detours, no delays.
Be IPO-ready. Apply instantly for UAE public listings and boost your share allocation with up to 5x leverage.
Security that works for you. Set controls on where and how you spend, backed by powerful encryption.
